welcome_benefits: 500 bonus reward points as a welcome benefit on payment of membership fees.

Rewards Rate: 2 reward points on every Rs 150 spent on domestic and international travel, hotels, and air tickets. 1.5X reward points on every Rs 150 spent on restaurants, medical bills, insurance, rail tickets, movies, and car rentals

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Waiver of annual fee on spends of Rs. 1 lakh
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs 500 and Rs 4000 at petrol stations in India. Maximum discount of Rs 200 per billing cycle.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2% on the withdrawal amount subject to minimum charge of Rs 100

product_details: 500 bonus reward points as sign-up bonus
2 reward points on every Rs 150 spent on domestic travels, international travel, and air tickets
1.5X reward points on every Rs 150 spent on restaurants, medical bills, insurance, rail tickets, movie ticket booking, and car rentals
1% fuel surcharge waiver at petrol stations in India
